If you're intrigued by stories that delve into the world of war and politics, I'd recommend checking out Doctor Zhivago (1965). This epic film follows the life of a Russian physician during World War I and the October Revolution, featuring a star-studded cast including Julie Christie, Hugh Bonneville, Keira Knightley, and more.

Another captivating film is Eve's Bayou (1997), which explores secrets, lies, and mystic forces within an affluent family. This movie stars Lynn Whitfield, Diahann Carroll, Jurnee Smollett-Bell, and more, and has a plot that will keep you engaged from start to finish.
